meanings.definition: To go beyond in quantity, degree, rate, etc.
meanings.sent1: The number of candies exceeded my expectations.
meanings.sent2: She exceeded the speed limit while driving.
meanings.sent3: The amount of laughter in the room exceeded the number of jokes told.
meanings.sent4: His dedication to his craft exceeded all boundaries.
meanings.sent5: The excitement in the stadium exceeded all previous games.

meanings.definition: To surpass; be superior to; excel.
meanings.sent1: Her artwork always exceeded mine in creativity.
meanings.sent2: The new model of the car exceeded all expectations.
meanings.sent3: The cat's ability to nap all day exceeded even my laziness.
meanings.sent4: His kindness exceeded any act of generosity I had seen before.
meanings.sent5: The beauty of the sunset exceeded any painting I had ever seen.
